title: The Mayan Treasure
description: A thrilling adventure where the protagonist searches an ancient Mayan tomb for treasure.

tree.title: The Entrance
tree.description: You stand before the entrance of an ancient Mayan tomb. The air is heavy with the scent of history and danger. You can either enter the tomb or walk away.

tree.title: Entering the Tomb
tree.description: You step inside the tomb, and the darkness surrounds you. The air is stale and cold. As you move forward, you notice two paths: one going left, and the other going right.

tree.title: Walking Away
tree.description: You decide that the risk is too great, and you walk away from the tomb. The treasure remains undiscovered, and the secrets of the tomb are left untouched.

tree.title: Left Path
tree.description: You take the left path, which leads you to a small chamber filled with ancient artifacts. Among them, you find a priceless Mayan artifact. You take it and exit the tomb, victorious in your discovery.

tree.title: Right Path
tree.description: You take the right path, which leads you to a large chamber with a deadly trap. Before you can react, the trap is triggered, and the tomb becomes your final resting place.
